english.segment1: Bet add up those points, now your card reads better. Than mine
english.segment2: I apologize. I've been trying to look up. Not around this time. Your wrists are weak my friend
english.segment3: Oh brother hold your head high. But here is the fall. I'm watching your feet go over with your eyes wide shut. New record, new shirt, the hair to match. I'm ready. To work. The room weighs heavy that your in. My friend you had less points then
english.segment4: I apologize. I've been trying to look up. Not around this time. Your weak my friend. Your shoulder is cold. We just talked yesterday. When did this crowd form?. Do I need to check in at the door?
english.segment5: You'd rather wave your new flag and. Biting down on your own insecurity. You invite division. Amongst a group. Called unity
english.segment6: Oh brother. You hold your. Your head high. Oh brother. You hold your. Your head low
english.segment7: I'm trying. To catch up. But where's my. Pen and pad, pen and pad. And look at you all lined up. I'll try this time. I'm trying. To catch up. But where's my. Pen and pad, pen and pad. Look at you all lined up. I'll try this time
english.segment8: I'm trying to. To catch up. Look at you. All lined up
